attributes.action: For Brexit  voters who now prefer to vote Remain in a 2nd EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Considerable anecdotal and brexit television interviewees talking of change of heart are evident. It is likely a considerable number will be alarmed over possible economy slide and increased taxes and austerity in the new Out government - Just as those in Greece voting in an anti austerity party that had to implement austerity measures.
Key member states are uncomfortable with a bunch of EU rulings, and together EU countries can encourage change.
attributes.background:
with the massive and fast increasing signatories to a sought 2nd EU referendum, it will be useful for parliament to see that there are those now wishing to replace their out votes to join the over 16 million remain voters.
EU members can get together and challenge current EU failings, and succeed .
